description.value:
School: enchantment (compulsion) [mind-affecting];
Level: Assassin 3, Bard 3, Sorcerer 3, Wizard 3;
Components: V, S, M (a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a live cricket)
Casting Time: 1 round
Range: close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Area: one or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
Duration: 1 Minute/Level
Power Points/Spell Points Cost: 5
Saving Throw: Will negates
Spell Resistance: yes

Description

A sleep spell causes a magical slumber to come upon 10 Hit Dice of creatures. Creatures with the fewest HD are affected first.

Among creatures with equal HD, those who are closest to the spell’s point of origin are affected first. Hit Dice that are not sufficient to affect a creature are wasted.

Sleeping creatures are helpless. Slapping or wounding awakens an affected creature, but normal noise does not. Awakening a creature is a standard action (an application of the aid another action).

Sleep does not target unconscious creatures, constructs, or undead creatures.

Material Component: A pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a live cricket.

materials.value: a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a live cricket

A sleep spell causes a magical slumber to come upon 10 Hit Dice of creatures. Creatures with the fewest HD are affected first.

Among creatures with equal HD, those who are closest to the spell’s point of origin are affected first. Hit Dice that are not sufficient to affect a creature are wasted.

Sleeping creatures are helpless. Slapping or wounding awakens an affected creature, but normal noise does not. Awakening a creature is a standard action (an application of the aid another action).

Sleep does not target unconscious creatures, constructs, or undead creatures.

Material Component: A pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a live cricket.
system.snip: Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.

specialActions.action: Create unique "Deep Slumber" from "D35E.commonbuffs" on target;Set buff "Deep Slumber" field data.level to max(1,(@cl)) on target;Activate buff "Deep Slumber" on target
specialActions.name: Deep Slumber

system.spellArea: one or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
